	// Add your code here

  var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
  target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
  }


})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_58872_needit_historic_needit_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-15 13:05:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>440bfade2f962010572f2c6df699b692</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_440bfade2f962010572f2c6df699b692</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-15 13:20:50</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_58872_needit_needit</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
